description: A certain anonymous benefactor has commissioned the development of genetically engineered monstergirls.  Considering what happened to the other abductees, a pair of fluffy ears isn't too bad.

As if being abducted and experimented on wasn't bad enough, they've now sold you off to a billionaire as their first success.  Who knows what that degenerate would've done with your fluffy ears if the cataclysm didn't start.
A certain anonymous benefactor has commissioned the development of genetically engineered monstergirls.  Considering what happened to the other abductees, a fluffy tail isn't too bad.

As if being abducted and experimented on wasn't bad enough, they've now sold you off to a billionaire as their first success.  Who knows what that degenerate would've done with your fluffy tail if the cataclysm didn't start.
A certain anonymous benefactor has commissioned the development of genetically engineered monstergirls.  Considering what happened to the other abductees, a pair of wings isn't too bad.

As if being abducted and experimented on wasn't bad enough, they've now sold you off to a billionaire as their first success.  Who knows what that degenerate would've done with your wings if the cataclysm didn't start.
A certain anonymous benefactor has commissioned the development of genetically engineered monstergirls.  Considering what happened to the other abductees, some tentacle legs aren't too bad.

As if being abducted and experimented on wasn't bad enough, they've now sold you off to a billionaire as their first success.  Who knows what that degenerate would've done with your tentacles if the cataclysm didn't start.
A certain anonymous benefactor has commissioned the development of genetically engineered monstergirls.  Considering what happened to the other abductees, some leaves aren't too bad.

As if being abducted and experimented on wasn't bad enough, they've now sold you off to a billionaire as their first success.  Who knows what that degenerate would've done with your leaves if the cataclysm didn't start.
A certain anonymous benefactor has commissioned the development of genetically engineered monstergirls.  Considering what happened to the other abductees, hooves aren't too bad.

As if being abducted and experimented on wasn't bad enough, they've now sold you off to a billionaire as their first success.  Who knows what that degenerate would've done with your hooves if the cataclysm didn't start.
